clues.text: This London square is dominated by a 170-foot column topped by a statue of Horatio Nelson

rounds.comments: (Alex: This is a crossword-type category; I'll give you a clue & the number of letters in it, & each correct response will have "nine" in it)

rounds.text: Dramatizing a murder from the year 1170, a 1935 T.S. Eliot play aptly had its first performance in this English city
